article_text:
How’s business shaping up for 2015?

We asked the 153 members of The Wall Street Journal CEO Council if they are positive or negative about the year ahead. And they said…

Wait a minute. Is this really as good a barometer as it sounds? CEOs aren’t exactly your average personality type. They are, it turns out, optimism addicts—or at least...

twitter.description: Corporate leaders are bullish on 2015 and cite a long list of new tailwinds, and a shorter list of headwinds.
twitter.title: CEOs Make Bullish Pitch for 2015

image.alt: CEOs make a bullish pitch for 2015
